leftContainer.title: Web Development
items: Proficient in React, with experience building dynamic and responsive web applications.
Solid understanding of databases and how to integrate them into user interfaces.
Competent in object-oriented programming (OOP), particularly in C++, for developing desktop applications.
Skilled in version control using Git.

leftContainer.title: Other technical knowledge
items: Implemented several Deep Learning algorithms using Keras library (TensorFlow), with a special focus on image recognition through neural networks.
Knowledge of operating systems, particularly skilled in using Ubuntu (Linux).
Familiarity with graphic design using AutoCAD.

leftContainer.title: Core Strengths
items: Strong interest in continuous learning and motivation to tackle new challenges.
Effective communication skills, with an open attitude to help whenever possible.
